name: terrible satle
description:
ini adalah game petualang kamu ada seseorang yang bernama life ever ia tersesat dihutan lalu iya melihat tumbuhan yang  berbicara sendiri dan ternyata itu manusia tetapi jiwa nya diambil dan di jaga ketat oleh 3 scarys dihutan itu

english subtitle

this is an adventurous game you have someone named life ever he got lost in the forest then he saw a plant that could talk to itself and it turned out to be a human but his soul was taken and guarded by 3 scarys in the forest
